triadConfront.pattern: Three figures arranged in an uneven triangle; two loosely aligned, one isolated.

corridorPush.pattern: Characters advance down a corridor while trading crucial information.

tableArc.pattern: Slow arc around a seated or anchored central figure.

relayExchange.pattern: Sequential handoff of data pads, tools, or physical documents.

crosscutPositions.pattern: Characters move in opposing directions, crossing frame lines.
crosscutPositions.usage: Moments of divergence or unresolved conflict.
